title: 给掉地的属性箭设置为1分
author: 840196733mw
txt_content: 如题所述，以及钓钩在选择器里面的名字，雪球在选择器里面的名字

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard objectives add OnGround dummy
/scoreboard players set @e[type=tipped_arrow] OnGround 1 {OnGround:1b}
吊钩是unknown（不知为何叫“未知”...）
雪球是Snowball
没人抢爱心我就来

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-10-19 22:36
加分：/scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] 计分板名称 1 {inGround:1b}
吊钩是钓鱼竿前面的那个么：ht ...
属性箭 亲 ，不是普通的弓箭

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-10-20 19:40
属性箭 亲 ，不是普通的弓箭
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow] 计分板名称 1 {inGround:1b}

inGround：在地上

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-10-23 21:16
/scoreboard objectives add OnGround dummy
/scoreboard players set @e[type=tipped_arrow] OnGround 1 { ...

哭，为何这个问题如此难回答

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-10-23 21:16
/scoreboard objectives add OnGround dummy
/scoreboard players set @e[type=tipped_arrow] OnGround 1 { ...
搞定，名字是TippedArrow所有名字都是单词首字母大写，中间不停顿隔开

看着我好不容易自己解决问题的份上求给点鼓励
